title: Imam Ghazzali and the robbers of khorasan
description: Book 1 of the "Meet the Luminaries series" From Adab Kids Publications.An entertaining picture book that introduce Imam Ghazzali for kids. This book with its high-quality graphical images is going to attract even the most reluctant of young readers. Meet the luminaries series aims to motivate children to build reading habits, while introducing them to the great architects of Islamic civilization.Additional Information:Reading level: 4 - 10 yearsPublisher: Adab Kids PublicationsProduct Dimensions: 24*17 cm
author: Hasim, Nabeel
